author: Seren Morris
title: South Carolina Coronavirus Lockdown Rules Explained as State Becomes Latest to Issue Stay-at-Home Order
description: Violation of South Carolina's new "home or work" order will result in a fine of $100 or up to 30 days in jail.
content:
South Carolina has become the latest state to issue a statewide stay-at-home order as it reports 2,232 confirmed cases of the coronavirus and 48 deaths.
On March 31, without passing a stay-at-home order, Republican Gov. Henry McMaster ordered that non-essent… [+5963 chars]
